wikitext.*:
'''The Return of the King''' can refer to:
==Books==
* '''''[[The Return of the King]]'', being the Third Part of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.'''
* ''[[The Art of The Return of the King]]'', a film tie-in photobook by [[Gary Russell]].
* ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King Visual Companion]]'', a film tie-in photobook by [[Jude Fisher]].
==Adaptations==
* [[The Return of the King (1980 film)|''The Return of the King'' (1980 film)]], the [[Rankin/Bass]] TV film.
* ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'', the [[2003]] film directed by [[Peter Jackson]].
** [[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (extended edition)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King'' (extended edition)]], a version of the film with an extra 52 minutes.
** [[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (video game)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King'' (video game)]], [[Electronic Arts]]' video game adaptation of the 2003 film. 
** ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack]]''
*** ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King - The Complete Recordings]]''
*** [[The Return of the King (soundtrack)|"The Return of the King" (soundtrack)]], a song from the soundtrack.
* "The Return of the King", the 24th episode of [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (1981 radio series)]].
